fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.equipments.hem

Class HEM

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.equipments.hem.HEM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI

    public class HEM
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
    The class HEM implements the basis for a household energy management component.

    Description

    As is, this component is only a very limited starting point for the actual component. The given code is there only to ease the understanding of the objectives, but most of it must be replaced to get the correct code. Especially, no registration of the components representing the appliances is given.

    Glass-box Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Black-box Invariants

     invariant       X_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0
 invariant       Y_RELATIVE_POSITION >= 0

    Created on : 2021-09-09

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
